sourcesContent:
import { useState } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import { ChatOutput } from "./ChatOutput"; import { SideBarForChat } from "./SideBarForChat"; export const Chat = () => { const [input, setInput] = useState(""); const [chatOutput, setChatOutput] = useState([]); async function SubmitHandler(event) { event.preventDefault(); setInput(""); setChatOutput([ ...chatOutput, { userInput: input, serverResponse: "loading" }, ]); const response = await axios.get("https://catfact.ninja/fact?max_length=140"); setChatOutput((prevChatOutput) => { const updatedChatOutput = [...prevChatOutput]; const loadingIndex = updatedChatOutput.findIndex( (message) => message.serverResponse === "loading" ); if (loadingIndex !== -1) { updatedChatOutput[loadingIndex].serverResponse = response.data.fact; } return updatedChatOutput; }); } return (
Anderson Vanhron
Junior Developer
{chatOutput.map((message, index) => ( ))}
setInput(e.target.value)} type="text" value={input} placeholder="Write your message!" className="w-full focus:outline-none focus:placeholder-gray-400 text-gray-600 placeholder-gray-600 pl-12 bg-gray-200 rounded-md py-3" />
) }
